<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Twin Distraction](/Feats.aspx?ID=4939) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=687" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 172 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Red Mantis Assassin](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=271) (Level 6)

**Prerequisites**
[Twin Feint](/Feats.aspx?ID=4921)

**Requirements**
You are wielding two melee weapons, each in a different hand

</column>

---

Your movements with two weapons are so swift and disorienting that they befuddle your opponent. When using Twin Feint, if both your Strikes deal damage to a targeted creature, the target must succeed at a Will saving throw against your class DC or become stupefied 1 until the end of your next turn.
name: Twin Distraction
requirement: You are wielding two melee weapons, each in a different hand
